string.name: name
string.value: A brave warrior to defeat King Clang appears!

Complaining Riel soon lightens up and says that a brave warrior must appear to rescue the beautiful girl in distress. Therefore, she asks me to take the role of the warrior and defeat King Clang. What have I done to get myself into these situations!? I'm not the warrior type, but the least I can do is help defeat #rKing Clang#k. \n\n#o5220000# #r#a21611##k
Defeated King Clang and came back to Riel. Riel joyfully says that a brave warrior saved her. It really wasn't for her sake, but Florina Beach is finally back to its peaceful state.

Oh my... I've lost the bet, and it's all because of you! I've always wanted to be the beautiful maiden that sacrifices herself to save her village. I will never forgive you! How could you disappoint me like this?!
What? No, no. All the endings of this kind of story include a brave and handsome #bwarrior#k that comes to rescue the beautiful maiden in distress and defeats the monster! There still is a way!
Adventurer! It's up to you to complete this story with a happy ending! A warrior throwing himself to save the damsel is always heroic! You must take this role!

I must admit, the story unraveling is somewhat different from what I planned, but this has its own merits to it too. Adventurer... no I mean, warrior! Please defeat #rKing Clang#k, and save the damsel!
No, how could you?! How can you turn down a great role like this! You are no fun at all!
You've come back, warrior! I, #bRael#k, was worried sick over you and couldn't sleep at all! \r\n#L0# #b(Absorbed in the role already!)#l
Oh, I'm so happy to see you again. Thank you, thank you very much! How can I pay you for your deed? What? You don't need anything?\r\n#L0# #b(... I didn't say a word!!)#l
You are brave but also modest. You truly are a real warrior! I will never forget you name!
I will sing a song of a brave young warrior who never hesitated to rescue the beautiful island girl from the dreadful monster! Oh, how could you be so courageous?
You haven't defeated #rKing Clang#k yet? If it's a burden to you... you may back out, warrior. You don't need to throw yourself to save little old me... sniffle...
